content: Assemble a list of 22 words that begin with 'de'

Sure, here's a list of 22 words that start with "de":

1. deactivate
2. debate
3. deceive
4. decide
5. declare
6. decorate
7. decrease
8. deciduous
9. decimal
10. december
11. decorate
12. deduct
13. delicate
14. deliver
15. demand
16. demonic
17. demo
18. democracy
19. demolish
20. denominator
21. denounce
22. department

I hope this helps!
